actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to establish the Frederick Law Olmstead Home and Office in Brookline, Mass., as a national historic site.

summary.text: Establishes the Frederick Law Olmsted Home and Office in Brookline, Massachusetts, as a national historic site. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to administer this Act, and creates an Advisory Commission to assist him. Authorizes necessary appropriations to carry out this Act.

titles.title: A bill to establish the Frederick Law Olmstead Home and Office in Brookline, Mass., as a national historic site.
